headline: Ulta Beauty price target raised to $750 from $675 at Oppenheimer
summary: Oppenheimer raised the firm’s price target on Ulta Beauty (ULTA) to $750 from $675 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. Based on its work, the firm is lifting its price target primarily reflecting the recent re-rating in discretionary names and its increased confidence in Ulta’s FY26 newness pipeline with the upcoming Rare Beauty launch. headline: Is Ulta Beauty's Skincare Business Emerging as a Key Demand Anchor?
summary: ULTA's skincare delivers high single-digit comp growth in Q3, led by prestige, mass, wellness and K-beauty demand.
